path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Konverter Smartcontracts - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Incorrect condition checking
findings.description: In the `migrate` function of the `MigratorKSP` contract, there is an incorrect checking condition between two variables (`tokenA` and `tokenB`) that leads to incorrect program execution flow.

findings.title: Incorrect Update of `_userVoted` in `vote` Function
findings.description: The state variable `_userVoted[user][lp]` is incorrectly updated in the `vote` function, which may cause votes of that user for the specified pool to be lower than the actual amount if the `vote` function is called multiple times.

findings.title: Incorrect Approval of `feeToken` for Contract Deployer
findings.description: In the `initialize` function of the `MoneyMakerKonverter` contract, the `feeToken` is approved for the contract deployer which is incorrect.

findings.title: LP token that follows the ERC777 standard can cause reentrancy problems
findings.description: If the lpToken follows the ERC777 standard, an attacker can deploy a smart contract with tokensToSend and tokensReceived hooks to perform a reentrancy attack that calls back to this contract in the same transaction.

findings.title: Missing front-running protection for the `approve` function
findings.description: The `approve` functions for both `KonverterERC20` and `StableSwapPoolToken` do not have any mechanism to protect the logic against front-running attacks.

findings.title: Wrong timestamp checking lead to be inconsistent code
findings.description: The function 'isPhase2EventPeriod' has incorrect timestamp checking, leading to inconsistent code and potential issues with phase transitions.

findings.title: Incorrect order of arithmetic operations
findings.description: The calculation of `amount0Out` and `amount1Out` are incorrect due to the use of `*=` operators. In this context, multiplications must be performed before divisions.
